div.p: To the Société nationale d'acclimatation de France

Letter not found. The text given here is from Bulletin de la Société nationale d'acclimatation de France, series 4, vol. 3, p. 400 (1886). The letter is dated to April as the latest likely date that it could have been sent to have been reported at the meeting of 28 May 1886.
[M. le baron Ferd. Von Mueller, botaniste du gouvernement à Melbourne, adresse l'expression de ses sentiments de condoléance à l'occasion de la mort de notre regretté Président, M. Henri Bouley.]

p.seg: [Baron Ferd. Von Mueller, government botanist in Melbourne, expresses his condolences on the occasion of the death of our late President, Mr Henri Bouley.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3346in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3346in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: Bouley died on 2 December 1885; his death was announced at the meeting of the Society held on 4 December and reported in the December number of the Bulletin, p. 699.
